content.body: I was playing with TypeScript's source maps support, and I noticed that ignores `.d.ts.map` files if they do not have a `"file"` property. Do you know if there is any other tool that does the same?
content.formatted_body: I was playing with TypeScript's source maps support, and I noticed that ignores .d.ts.map files if they do not have a "file" property. Do you know if there is any other tool that does the same?

content.body: The spec says that it's optional but maybe it should at least be recommended
